scripts.asbuild:gx_tex: npx asc gx_texture_as.ts --baseDir ./src/assembly -O3 --runtime none -b gx_texture_as.wasm -t gx_texture_as.wat
scripts.asbuild:yaz0: npx asc Yaz0_as.ts --baseDir ./src/assembly -O3 --runtime none --noAssert -b Yaz0_as.wasm -t Yaz0_as.wat
scripts.asbuild: yarn asbuild:gx_tex && yarn asbuild:yaz0 && node src/build_wat.js
scripts.build: parcel build --public-url=./ src/index.html src/embed.html && cp -f node_modules/librw/lib/librw.wasm dist/
